welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Stroudsburg, the charming gateway to the Pocono Mountains! Get ready to experience the beauty of our quaint town and all it has to offer. We invite you to explore and embrace the unique charm of East Stroudsburg during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mt Pocono Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mt Pocono Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
